description: The Meadow Fawn is a gentle creature that roams enchanted forests and meadows. It is known for its calming presence and its ability to heal minor wounds with a touch of its nose. Its fur is a mix of soft green and earthy brown, blending perfectly with the environment. Meadow Fawns are guardians of nature, often seen frolicking among flowers and helping lost travelers find their way.
languages: Sylvan, understands Common but cannot speak

traits.name: Natural Camouflage
traits.description: The Meadow Fawn has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in forested or grassy areas.

traits.name: Healing Touch
traits.description: The Meadow Fawn can touch a creature with its nose, healing 1d6 hit points. It can use this ability three times per day.

actions.name: Hoof
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
